title: BARD - Digging Past The Headlines
itunes:title: BARD - Digging Past The Headlines
description:
Mark and Gary link up again on a Sunday to give their take on a case that has been heavily reported, but maybe not entirely properly. They also discuss a development in a Nevada case involving a former NFL player and give a preview of the week to come, enjoy!

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
